body.p:
Winchester Ky 2 July 1861
Hon B Magoffin
Dr Sir,

This afternoon I unwittingly violated an ordinance of this place by shooting a Pistol at a mark on my own fence in a 12 acre lot I own just within the limits of the town boundary I was not aware of the ^extent of the^ bye law or I should not have done so I have just confessed judgment for $300 fine & costs $450 I respectfully ask your Excellency in these hard times to send me a remission Your attention will oblige

Winchester Po Ct
$3. } breach of ordinance
Jas Flanagan
Geo. F Whitehead
Remission Issd July 18 1861
